MajorClaims.Text: the zoo deserves maintenance and public respect
the role of zoos towards both human and animals is undeniably indispensable

Claims.Text: the zoo should be considered as a means of education with regard to providing real and vivid materials for learners
the zoo also serve as a means of ecological protection

Premises.Text: With zoos, pupils will have a chance of observing the habit and unique instinct of, for instance, a lion or a crocodile
zoos conduce to the acquisition of knowledge at various levels
it is of university students' benefits to do biological research based on practical statistics and live recordings, which otherwise would not be at hand
Nowadays the process of globalisation is accompanied by the encroachment upon natural habitats, which consequently calls for the help of zoos
the ever-increasing huntings are having a heavy toll on rare and specious species
Only when zoos appear are such distinction-driven animals as: giraffe, panda, koala or leopard provided with their own inaccessible territory
